Crimes.Crime_Type: Human Rights Violations and Serious International Law Offenses
Crimes.Legal_Provision_Involved: Sections 87, 112, and 113 of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act (IRPA)
Crimes.Outcome: Application for judicial review dismissed as moot
Crimes.Grounds_for_Claim: Risk of torture upon return to India
Remedy_Requested: Order a new consideration of protection application
Crimes.Standard_of_Review: Mootness and discretion to hear moot cases
Crimes.Evidence_Requirement: Evidence of risk upon return and credibility of claims
Crimes.Institutional_Action: Deportation enforced prior to PRRA determination
Crimes.Government_Body_or_Authority: Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA), Immigration Division
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Affidavits, country condition reports, security assessments
Crimes.Assessment_Standard: Whether remedies would have practical effect post-deportation
Crimes.Complaint_Issues: Enforcement of removal before risk assessment completed
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Mootness doctrine under Canadian administrative law
Crimes.Protection_Claim: Risk of torture under Article 3 of CAT
Crimes.State_Protection_Assessment: India's ability to protect from torture questioned
Crimes.Risk_Factor: Membership in banned organization, past persecution
Crimes.Credibility: Challenged due to false entry and alleged terrorist links
Crimes.Legal_Provision: Section 97(1) IRPA (protection from danger), Section 115(1) IRPA (PRRA eligibility)
Crimes.Targeted_Group: Sikh separatists or individuals linked to Khalistan movement
Crimes.State_Protection_Adequacy: Assessed as insufficient by applicant, disputed by authorities
Crimes.Risk_Nature: Risk of torture or cruel and unusual treatment
Crimes.Claimant_Status: Inadmissible permanent resident or foreign national
Crimes.Perpetrator_Entity: Indian state actors or non-state actors in Punjab
Crimes.Legal_Basis: Violation of Charter rights and international obligations
Crimes.Victim_Basis: Political opinion, association with banned group

Crimes.Dispute_Type: Judicial review of refusal of protection claim
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Mootness of judicial review after deportation
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Negative – based on false documentation and links to terrorism
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Immigration application records, security intelligence, affidavits
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Withholding of information and submission of false documents
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Materiality of misrepresentation to immigration decision
Crimes.Proceeding_Type: Pre-removal risk assessment and judicial review
Crimes.Application_Error: False identity and concealment of affiliation
Crimes.Evidence_Ignored: None identified – evidence was central to finding
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Authenticity of documents and credibility of testimony
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Alleged lack of opportunity to respond to security allegations
Crimes.Document_Fraud: Use of false passport and identity papers
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Charter arguments regarding fairness and security certificate process
Crimes.Relevant_Law: IRPA, Charter of Rights and Freedoms
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Timing of removal relative to pending review
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to disclose membership and true identity

Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Found not credible due to forged documents
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Photographic identification, forensic document analysis, travel records
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Use of fraudulent passport and visa documents
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Knowledge and intent in using false documents
Crimes.Application_Error: Submission of altered or counterfeit identity documents
Crimes.Assessment_Standard: Materiality and intentionality of document fraud
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Reasonableness standard applied to administrative decisions
Crimes.Application_Factor: Pattern of deception in entry and stay
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Possession and use of false identity documents
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Chain of custody and authenticity of seized documents
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Right to be heard on document authenticity
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Lack of access to full security dossier
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Removal before completion of legal process

Crimes.National_Security_Element: Link to proscribed organization (Khalistan Zindabad Force)
Crimes.National_Security_Danger: Potential threat to public safety and national security
Crimes.Threat_Assessment: Based on intelligence and organizational affiliation
Crimes.Admission_or_Involvement: Alleged active participation in support network
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Intelligence reports, intercepted communications, witness statements
Crimes.Evidence_Issues: Use of secret evidence without full disclosure
Crimes.Governing_Provision: Listed Terrorist Entities under Security of Canada Information Sharing Act
Crimes.Authority_Body: Canadian Security Intelligence Service (CSIS), Minister of Public Safety
Crimes.Authority_Decision: Designation as inadmissible on security grounds
Crimes.Reasoning_Deficiency: Alleged lack of transparency in security assessment
Crimes.Detention_Factors: Flight risk and danger to public
Crimes.Deportation_Risk: High – executed despite human rights concerns

Crimes.National_Security_Element: Direct involvement in violent acts or planning
Crimes.National_Security_Danger: Threat to domestic and international security
Crimes.Threat_Assessment: Based on intelligence linking individual to attacks or plots
Crimes.Nature_of_Acts: Planning, financing, or execution of violence
Crimes.Target_Entity: Government or civilian infrastructure in India
Crimes.Admission_or_Involvement: Alleged operational role in militant activities
Crimes.Individual_Behavior: Recruitment, funding, or logistical support for attacks
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Surveillance data, informant testimony, financial records
Crimes.Key_Evidence_Issue: Authentication of digital and financial trails
Crimes.Evidence_Issues: Use of classified evidence limiting defense response
Crimes.Authority_Body: CSIS, RCMP, Minister of Public Safety
Crimes.Authority_Decision: Inadmissible on grounds of engaging in terrorism
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Due process limitations in national security cases
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness_Issue: Inability to fully challenge secret evidence
Crimes.Institutional_Bias_Allegation: Potential bias in security screening of diaspora communities
